ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | matbas.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | matbas.g | |- G = ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_matbas | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` A ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_matplusg | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> ( +g ` G ) = ( +g ` A ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_oveqdr | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) /\ ( x e. ( Base ` G ) /\ y e. ( Base ` G ) ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` G ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` A ) y ) ) |
| 7 | 3, 4, 6 | #P_grpidpropd | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> ( 0g ` G ) = ( 0g ` A ) ) |
